• Introducing new courses

• Build a relationship across different sector

• To provide quality training

• Adopt new technologies to improve the training

• Global influences

• Market development

Threats

• Changes in the VET sector

• Changes in the Australian political system

• Increased number of RTO providers and competition

• Failure to invest in marketing and advertising appropriately





Marketing mix

Product

Product/services offered are Diploma and Advanced Diploma of Business. The upcoming planned new course, General English-speaking course.

Place

Product/service is intended for college/university students and faculty of Melbourne. It is available face-to-face and via the Internet on any electronic device.

Price

Pricing covers significant costs related to course design, development, resources required and cash flow for future growth.

Promotion

The product/service must be promoted in current and other prospective markets through market development.

The channels will include print media, advertisements and social media platforms

Marketing promotions

Career Training’s marketing promotions program is simplistic, out of date and not yet integrated.

The promotions are limited and predominately traditional. They don’t take into account the rise of social media and social media platforms.

Budget

The management has allocated 5% to 7% of the development budget for marketing opportunities. The development budget is $120,000 (One hundred and twenty thousand dollars)

Task:

The management has appointed you as a new marketing manager.As part of your new role, you called a meeting with relevant staff members to ascertain the key objectives required to move forward with the planned marketing outlines.

The meeting minutes are below including the outcomes and expectations.Use the information to identify the key areas that you, as the Marketing Manager need to focus on and follow the instructions on the assessment requirements. Topics discussed: Discussion on business objectives:The marketing manager presented and target customers and current marketing strategies, Presentation on current market Market trends: product development and trends, potentially new markets and market diversification competitors,Discussion on the marketing opportunities identified. And the following were the discussion held: The marketing manager confirmed the organisational requirements and current strategies, Market trends: product development and market diversification, Potential markets: Other Australian cities through an online course, Competitors: RTO offering a similar course in a specific region and also discussed about * Introduction of new course
* Extend the target market into
* Sydney and Brisbane through online business courses
* Increase the advertising campaign like social media, email marketing
* Upgrade the ability and strength of the organisation by increasing the current quality service standards and upgrading the skills

For each one of the four (4) marketing opportunities that you have identified as being most viable, develop a report that addresses:

1. Alignment of marketing opportunities with the business’ goals and capabilities

Rating of the marketing opportunities and selection of two (2) best opportunities:
Explain why you have chosen the 2 that you have in detail below:

Based on the discussion in the meeting and the SWOT analysis, the four most viable marketing opportunities for Career Training are:

1. Introduction of new course
2. Extend the target market into Sydney and Brisbane through online business courses
3. Increase advertising campaigns like social media and email marketing
4. Upgrade the ability and strength of the organisation by increasing the current quality service standards and upgrading the skills

Alignment of marketing opportunities with the business’ goals and capabilities:

1. Introduction of new course – This opportunity aligns with Career Training’s business goals of promoting courses in business and increasing enrolments. It also aligns with the capability of the organisation, as it has experienced management and staff, and industry contacts to support the development and delivery of new courses.

2. Extend the target market into Sydney and Brisbane through online business courses – This opportunity aligns with Career Training’s vision of becoming Australia’s leading academy of business and developing well-equipped world leaders. It also aligns with the capability of the organisation, as the courses can be delivered online and do not require physical infrastructure.

3. Increase advertising campaigns like social media and email marketing – This opportunity aligns with Career Training’s objective of ensuring a consistent and positive brand message for the RTO and increasing brand awareness and market share. It also aligns with the capability of the organisation, as it has allocated a budget for marketing and can leverage digital technology to reach a wider audience.

4. Upgrade the ability and strength of the organisation by increasing the current quality service standards and upgrading the skills– This opportunity aligns with Career Training’s values of providing a respectful and safe environment for all staff and students, integrity, transparency and accountability in work styles, fostering an inclusive learning environment for all students, continuous improvement, and integrating principles of equity and non-discrimination. It also aligns with the capability of the organisation, as it has a systematic approach to ensure quality across all training and assessment services, including staff and systems, and seeks feedback from students and internal staff every month.

Rating of the marketing opportunities and selection of two (2) best opportunities:

Based on the alignment with the business’ goals and capabilities, the two best marketing opportunities for Career Training are:

1. Introduction of new course – This opportunity will help Career Training in promoting courses in business and increasing enrolments. It will also contribute to the organisation’s capability development by expanding its course offerings.

2. Increase advertising campaigns like social media and email marketing – This opportunity will help Career Training in ensuring a consistent and positive brand message for the RTO, increasing brand awareness and market share. It will also contribute to the organisation’s capability development by leveraging digital technology to reach a wider audience.

Explanation:

The introduction of a new course aligns with Career Training’s business goals and vision, and the capability of the organisation to develop and deliver new courses. This opportunity can help in attracting new students and increasing enrolments, which is crucial for sustainable growth. Furthermore, it will allow the organisation to differentiate itself from competitors and meet the market demand for business courses.

The increase in advertising campaigns aligns with Career Training’s objective of brand awareness, and the capability of the organisation to allocate a budget for marketing and leverage digital technology. This opportunity can help in reaching a wider audience, increasing engagement on social media, and building a strong online presence. Moreover, it will allow the organisation to communicate its value proposition and maintain a positive brand image in the competitive market.

Now for  the two (2) best opportunities YOU shortlisted .
Using the 2 opportunities, you have researched – you will now do the following with those opportunities:

Plan and coordinate two (2) marketing activities related to these opportunities
1. Outline how you will utilise networks and List networks to be used:, List information sources to be used, What distribution and marketing networks can be utilised to promote these activities.
Apply marketing principles to each activity
2. Outline in detail the marketing management process of the activity:
Include resources (human and other), budget, timeline, alignment with marketing directions of organisation etc.
Fours P’s = product, place, price and promotion
SWOT analysis
3. Evaluate and report on the following criteria, for BOTH activities:
a.How did the activities align with the overall marketing direction of the organisation? b.What level of exposure is aiming to be achieved through this marketing activity? c.How will you match the attendees to the target audience? d. Was the activity cost effective overall? Explain.

Opportunity 1: Introduction of new course

Marketing Activity 1: Social Media Campaign

Utilising Networks: Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn
Information Sources: Career Training website, course brochures, student testimonials
Distribution and Marketing Networks: Social media platforms, targeted email marketing, online advertising

Marketing Principles:
Product: Diploma of Marketing, a new course at Career Training
Place: Available to students both online and face-to-face
Price: Competitive pricing that covers costs related to course design, development, and resources required
Promotion: Using social media platforms, targeted email marketing and online advertising to promote the course

Marketing Management Process:
Resources: Social media manager, graphic designer, copywriter
Budget: $5,000
Timeline: 2 months
Alignment with marketing direction of organisation: Aligns with Career Training’s objective of introducing new courses and increasing enrolments. Also aligns with the organisation’s values of continuous improvement and providing quality training.
Four P’s:
- Product: Diploma of Marketing
- Place: Online and face-to-face
- Price: Competitive pricing
- Promotion: Social media platforms, targeted email marketing, online advertising
SWOT Analysis:
- Strength: Experienced management and staff, industry contacts, providing quality training
- Weakness: New RTO, not offering a range of qualifications
- Opportunities: Introducing new courses, global influences, market development, adopting new technologies to improve training
- Threats: Changes in the VET sector, competition, failure to invest in marketing and advertising appropriately

Evaluation:
a. The social media campaign aligns with Career Training’s objective of introducing new courses and increasing enrolments. It also aligns with the organisation’s values of continuous improvement and providing quality training.
b. The level of exposure aiming to be achieved through this marketing activity is to reach at least 10,000 potential students on social media, and to receive at least 100 inquiries about the new course.
c. To match the attendees to the target audience, the social media campaign will use targeted advertising to reach individuals who have shown interest in marketing courses previously, and individuals who fit the demographic of Career Training’s target audience.
d. Overall, this activity is cost-effective as the budget allocated is reasonable and the resources used are appropriate for the target audience and marketing objectives.

Marketing Activity 2: Open Day

Utilising Networks: Education agents, local businesses, alumni network
Information Sources: Career Training website, student testimonials, course brochures
Distribution and Marketing Networks: Invitations sent out to education agents, local businesses, and alumni network. Social media platforms and online advertising to promote the event.

Marketing Principles:
Product: Showcase all courses available at Career Training
Place: Career Training campus in Geraldton
Price: Free entry
Promotion: Invitations to education agents, local businesses, and alumni network. Social media platforms and online advertising to promote the event.

Marketing Management Process:
Resources: Event coordinator, graphic designer, copywriter
Budget: $10,000
Timeline: 3 months
Alignment with marketing direction of organisation: Aligns with Career Training’s objective of increasing enrolments and promoting all courses available. Also aligns with the organisation’s values of fostering an inclusive learning environment and continuous improvement.
Four P’s:
- Product: Showcasing all courses available at Career Training
- Place: Career Training campus in Geraldton
- Price: Free entry
- Promotion: Invitations to education agents, local businesses and alumni network. Social media platforms and online advertising to promote the event
SWOT Analysis:
- Strength: Experienced management and staff, industry contacts, providing quality training
- Weakness: New RTO, not offering a range of qualifications
- Opportunities: Introducing new courses, global influences, market development, adopting new technologies to improve training
- Threats: Changes in the VET sector, competition, failure to invest in marketing and advertising appropriately

Evaluation:
a. The open day aligns with Career Training’s objective of increasing enrolments and promoting all courses available. It also aligns with the organisation’s values of fostering an inclusive learning environment and continuous improvement.
b. The level of exposure aiming to be achieved through this marketing activity is reaching at least 50 education agents, 20 local businesses, and 100 alumni. Additionally, the goal is to receive at least 50 inquiries about enrolments after the event.
c. To match attendees to the target audience, invitations will be sent to education agents, local businesses and alumni network. The event will also be promoted to Career Training’s target audience through social media platforms and online advertising.
d. Overall, this activity is cost-effective as the budget allocated provides sufficient resources to organise the event and reach the target audience effectively.

In conclusion, both activities align with Career Training’s objectives and values, utilise appropriate networks and distribution channels, and require a reasonable budget and timeline. The social media campaign and open day are expected to generate significant exposure and inquiry numbers at a cost-effective level. The activities can help Career Training in introducing new courses and increasing enrolments, and promote all courses to a wide-ranging audience.
Please provide information in detail for each activity  the use of the Four P’s Principle

Marketing Activity 1: Social Media Campaign

Product: Career Training is introducing a new course, Diploma of Marketing. This will be the focus of the social media campaign, highlighting the benefits of this course, its unique features and delivery methods.

Place: The Diploma of Marketing course will be available both online and face-to-face at Career Training’s Geraldton campus. The social media campaign will promote the availability and options of the course.

Price: The pricing of the course will be competitive, covering significant costs related to course design, development, and resources required. The social media campaign will highlight the value of the course and its worth to potential students.

Promotion: The social media campaign will utilise social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, targeted email marketing, and online advertising to promote the Diploma of Marketing course. The focus will be on highlighting the course's unique features and benefits to reach and engage with the target audience effectively.

Marketing Activity 2: Open Day

Product: All courses available at Career Training will be showcased during the open day. This includes courses in business, community services, information technology, and hospitality.

Place: The open day will be held at Career Training’s Geraldton campus, highlighting the physical and academic resources available to students. This will allow potential students to understand the learning environment and delivery methods of Career Training.

Price: Entry to the open day will be free, making it accessible to a wider audience who would like to know more about Career Training’s available courses and its value proposition.

Promotion: Invitations to the open day will be sent out to education agents, local businesses, and the alumni network. The event will also be promoted through social media platforms and online advertising to reach a broader audience. The open day will showcase Career Training's unique value proposition and resources, thereby attracting a wide range of potential students.

The Four P’s Principles are crucial to both marketing activities. Ensuring that the right Product is promoted in the right Place at the right Price, and through the right Promotional activity can influence consumer purchase behavior. The Social Media Campaign prioritizes the Diploma of Marketing course and promotes its availability online and face-to-face, pricing, unique features and benefits through social media platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn, targeted email marketing, and online advertising. The Open Day prioritizes showcasing all courses available at Career Training while highlighting its value proposition and resources through free entry, Career Training’s Geraldton campus location, education agents, local businesses and alumni network invitations, and online promotion. Both activities aim to create a positive image of Career Training, to promote and increase enrolments, and are cost-effective.

Cooperative Online Marketing Initiatives for Career Training's Hospitality Courses:

Relevance to Career Training: eHotelier is an ideal platform for promoting Career Training's hospitality courses to potential employees of the hospitality industry. The platform connects professionals in the sector with a wide range of global employers.

Potential Benefits: By advertising the courses on eHotelier, Career Training can reach millions of professionals looking to advance their careers in the hospitality industry. Furthermore, it can improve Career Training's brand recognition and authority in the sector.

Technical and Finance Resource Requirements: To advertise on eHotelier, Career Training will have to pay for a featured listing or a sponsored article. Career Training will need to create a banner ad or article for the course promotion.

3. Hospitality Academy: Hospitality Academy is an online training platform for the hospitality industry providing a range of courses and certifications. Hospitality Academy has over 100,000 members and partners with various global hospitality associations.

Relevance to Career Training: Hospitality Academy is an ideal platform for advertising Career Training's hospitality courses to professionals looking to develop their skills and improve their career prospects in the sector.

Potential Benefits: By advertising courses on Hospitality Academy, Career Training can reach a global audience interested in furthering their career in the hospitality industry. Furthermore, it can increase the visibility of Career Training as a reputable provider of online hospitality courses.

Technical and Finance Resource Requirements: To advertise on Hospitality Academy, Career Training will have to pay a fee for a featured listing or a banner ad. Career Training will need to create a banner ad or article for the course promotion.

In the competition, participants form teams and are given coding challenges to complete within a given time frame. The challenges are designed to test their problem-solving, coding, and teamwork skills. The students are also provided with professional mentoring and support from industry professionals to help them develop their technical abilities and improve their performance.

In the qualifying round, students compete at the local level, with the top teams advancing to the regional finals. The winners of the regional finals then compete in the national finals to determine the overall winner of the competition.

The BDPA High School Coding Competition offers many benefits to participating students, including the opportunity to develop coding skills, work as a team, receive mentorship from industry professionals, and gain exposure to potential career paths in technology. 请描述目前石林县茶旅融合方面存在的问题，最好有文献说明

近年来，石林县逐渐走出一条融合茶文化和旅游业的发展道路，但在茶旅融合方面仍然存在一些问题：

1. 旅游资源单一问题：石林县茶文化资源得天独厚，但其他旅游资源相对单一。游客来到石林大多是为了观赏石山奇石，留恋时间较短，对茶文化的认知和体验难以充分展开，从而影响了石林县茶旅融合发展的深度和广度。

2. 缺乏全盘规划：石林县茶旅融合发展还处于初级阶段，缺乏全盘规划，从设计到推广缺乏系统性，导致游客价值认知和参与度不高。

3. 产业结构较为单一：石林县茶文化和旅游业的结合，茶旅融合的产业结构较为单一，主要以茶叶生产和茶文化展示为主，茶旅融合的其他元素的开发还有待提升。

以上内容参考了以下文献：

1. 程嘉璐, 谷京城, 李玥. 云南石林自然风景区茶文化与旅游融合发展模式研究[J]. 国土资源科技管理, 2018, 05: 36-41.

2. 陈梦瑶, 朱颖雪. 旅游与茶文化融合的探究——以云南石林茶文化园为例[J]. 农业试验科技, 2018, 04: 383-384.

conversation.content: 市场地位
市场地位是一个企业在其所处市场中占据的影响力和竞争力。它反映了一个企业在市场上的表现、认可度和竞争优势，是企业赢得市场份额和竞争优势的重要因素。市场地位通常与企业在市场中所处的位置、品牌价值、市场份额、产品质量、创新能力、客户服务等方面相关。在竞争激烈的市场中，保持和提升市场地位对企业的长期发展具有重要意义。
客户资源

客户资源是指企业所拥有的潜在客户、现有客户和老客户，以及他们所提供的价值和收益。客户资源是企业非常重要的一种资产，对企业的发展具有重大影响。客户资源一般可以分为以下几种：

1.潜在客户：企业尚未建立联系的潜在潜在客户，他们有可能成为新的客户。

2.现有客户：已经开展业务关系的客户，企业可以通过保持和增强现有客户的价值来提升其收益。

3.老客户：曾经是企业的客户，但由于某些原因停止了与企业的业务关系。

企业通过不断培育、维护和管理客户资源，可以更好地了解客户需求和偏好，并不断提升产品和服务质量，提高客户满意度和忠诚度，从而获得更多的市场份额和收益。通常企业通过增加客户数量、提高客户的付费能力、增加客户与企业的黏性等途径来提升客户资源的价值。

conversation.content: write an essay about BT sports : Unseen Stats campaign

Title: Peek Under the Net: BT Sports and the Unseen Stats Campaign

Introduction

The sport industry is a competitive playground, swamped by massive corporations that aim to dominate the market not only through extensive coverage of sporting events but also through innovative broadcasting strategies. BT Sport, one of the leading sports television channels in the United Kingdom, certainly recognizes the importance of this innovation in the sports media landscape. As a result, in recent years, the channel has launched its Unseen Stats campaign, a unique and captivating marketing initiative that aims to provide its audience with an advanced and interactive viewing experience. This essay will discuss BT Sport's Unseen Stats campaign, how it differentiates the channel from its competitors, and the potential benefits that it provides to various stakeholders in the sports industry.

Origins of the Unseen Stats Campaign

BT Sport, owned by British Telecommunications, was launched in 2013 and has since grown to become one of the primary sports channels in the UK. With its broad-ranging portfolio of sports rights to domestic football leagues and international events, BT Sport takes pride in its broad demographic appeal and ambitious goals. The Unseen Stats campaign was introduced in 2018 as a way to better engage its audience, drive subscriptions, and position itself as an industry leader in data-driven sports analysis. The campaign revolves around the idea of providing deeper insight and higher quality of sports data that goes beyond conventional statistics.

The Concept and Approach

The Unseen Stats campaign encompasses five important dimensions of analysis, including physicality, in-game intelligence, teamwork, situational success, and goal creation. These dimensions were designed to provide a more comprehensive overview of each player's performance and contribution to their team. BT Sport, in collaboration with Google and sports data company Squawka, employed machine learning to dissect over 1,000 hours of video footage and create in-depth statistics. This approach not only enhances the quality of analysis available to viewers but also introduces a new paradigm of understanding sports.

Implementation and Reception

During the 2018-19 football season, BT Sport showcased the Unseen Stats campaign in Premier League and Champions League broadcasts, with statistics, graphics, and commentary incorporating the campaign's insights. The channel also produced several supplementary content pieces surrounding the Unseen Stats, including videos and articles analyzing the performance of both individual players and their teams. BT Sport's content producers also developed new formats for presenting the Unseen Stats during live broadcasts and studio shows, engaging fans with data-driven conversations and debates about the sport.

The Unseen Stats campaign generated considerable buzz in the sports broadcasting community, with fans and experts praising BT Sport's innovative initiative. Football fans in particular found it enjoyable to have access to a more holistic understanding of their favorite players and teams. In addition, the advanced analytics and machine learning used for creating these in-depth statistics opened up a new realm of possibilities for future applications in the sports media landscape.

Stakeholder Benefits

The Unseen Stats campaign generates value in several significant ways. For fans, it means a more informed and engaging viewing experience, providing a fresh perspective on their favorite sports. For teams and coaches, the statistics provide insights into areas of performance that could prove essential for tactical decision-making and player development.

Furthermore, the Unseen Stats campaign has the potential to influence not only how sports broadcasters analyze games but also how they cover athletes and teams in broader narratives. For example, providing a metric on a player's in-game intelligence brings a new dimension to the analysis of their contribution to the team's success. As the campaign evolves and expands, BT Sport has the opportunity to further shape the sports media landscape, positioning itself as a market leader in providing advanced sports analytics to its audience.

Conclusion

The Unseen Stats campaign by BT Sport marks a significant step forward in how sports broadcasting connects with its audience. By delivering unique and data-driven insights, the campaign provides viewers with a richer understanding of the sports they love. This initiative, grounded in machine learning and advanced analytics, not only sets a high benchmark for competitors in the sports media industry but also has the potential to drive the entire industry toward more innovative concepts and approaches in sports analysis. BT Sport's Unseen Stats campaign not only reinforces the channel's commitment to offer its audience the best possible viewing experience but also makes a strong statement about the future of sports broadcasting being inextricably linked to technological innovation and advanced analytics.

conversations.facetValue: develop a strategic marketing plan, considering the increase in internet usage due to the Covid-19 pandemic and the challenges related to reaching a diverse audience.

allFacetValues.value: develop a strategic marketing plan, considering the increase in internet usage due to the Covid-19 pandemic and the challenges related to reaching a diverse audience.
English
develop a strategic marketing plan considering the increased internet usage and the digital divide among different demographics.

conversation.content:
Use the template overleaf to develop a strategic marketing plan for the organisation that you
have pre-prepared. Ensure that you consider all the points listed under each heading.
Below is an unforeseen scenario. It is essential that you take this into account when
developing your strategic marketing plan. 

The unforseen scenario is:

For many people today, the internet is vital for work, entertainment, socialising and other
aspects of daily life, so much so that it is often taken for granted. During the Covid-19
pandemic, for example, lockdowns and school closures encouraged people online and in the
first year of the crisis, the number of internet users globally grew by more than 10 percent.
But more than a third of the world’s population have never used the internet and in the 46
least-developed countries, three-quarters of people have never been online. In addition,
those less likely to use the internet include older adults, women and people living in rural
areas. For all types of organisations around the world, the internet is important for
conducting business, carrying out marketing, reaching customers and meeting demand.
Increasingly organisations are seeking to capitalise on the opportunities internet connection
provides, but it will be important not to lose sight of potential threats and challenges

Executive Summary:

This strategic marketing plan considers the unforeseen scenario of the significant increase in internet usage due to the Covid-19 pandemic and the potential challenges that come with it. The aim of this plan is to help the organization capitalize on the opportunities of internet connection while addressing the challenges arising from targeting a diverse audience.

Situational Analysis:

- Market Summary: The Covid-19 pandemic has led to a rapid increase in global internet usage, with a 10% growth in users within the first year. The organization needs to adapt its marketing strategies to this new market environment, ensuring that the diverse audience is targeted effectively.
- SWOT Analysis:
  - Strengths: Strong online presence, experience in digital marketing, established brand reputation
  - Weaknesses: Limited access to resources, potential digital divide among target audience, dependency on internet connection
  - Opportunities: Increased internet usage, untapped markets (older adults, women, and rural areas), potential partnerships with internet service providers
  - Threats: Overcrowded digital market, competitors targeting the same audience, digital divide hindering outreach to certain demographics

Market Segmentation:

- Demographics: The organization should consider targeting a diverse audience to capture the increased internet usage. This includes older adults, women, and people living in rural areas who are less likely to use the internet.
- Geographics: Focus on global markets and specifically least-developed countries where three-quarters of people have never been online.
- Psychographics: Appeal to the audience who value convenience, entertainment, and connectivity provided by the internet.

Objectives:

1. Increase awareness of the organization within the new target audience by 30% over the next 12 months.
2. Generate a 20% increase in revenue by reaching untapped markets and capitalizing on the growth in internet usage.
3. Develop strategic partnerships with internet service providers to increase accessibility for potential customers in least-developed countries.

Marketing Strategies:

1. Content Marketing: Develop useful and engaging content that appeals to the target demographics, accommodating their varying internet usage habits and access levels.
2. Social Media Marketing: Utilize various social media platforms to reach a broad audience, focusing on platforms with high user numbers among older adults, women, and rural populations.
3. Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Optimize the organization's online presence to rank higher in search results for relevant keywords, increasing visibility for potential customers.

Tactical Actions:

1. Conduct market research to better understand the needs and preferences of the new target audience, to tailor the marketing approach effectively.
2. Develop targeted ad campaigns for each demographic group, keeping in mind the nuances and preferences related to internet usage.
3. Create strategic partnerships with internet service providers in least-developed countries to provide affordable, reliable internet access to untapped markets.

Budget:

Allocate resources to digital marketing efforts, market research, and cultivating partnerships with internet service providers. Closely monitor the return on investment (ROI) of each initiative to ensure that the organization is maximizing its spending efficiency.

Control:

Regularly assess the progress and effectiveness of the marketing initiatives focusing on the following key performance indicators (KPIs):

- Increase in brand awareness among the target audience
- Increase in leads and conversions from new demographics
- ROI on marketing campaigns
- Percentage of internet users reached in least-developed countries
- Revenue growth from untapped markets

By considering the unforeseen scenario in this strategic marketing plan, the organization can capitalize on the opportunities brought by the increased internet usage and address the challenges faced in targeting diverse audiences across varying access levels. Developing targeted marketing initiatives and partnerships will ensure that the organization remains competitive while optimizing its marketing efforts to continuously engage and reach potential customers.

3. A/B test different elements (e.g. headline, CTAs, button colors) on priority pages
- Deliverable: A/B testing plan and results

G. Analytics and Reporting
1. Set up goals and conversion tracking in Google Analytics to monitor performance
- Deliverable: Setup of goals and conversion tracking
- KPI: Data accuracy, goal completions
2. Create custom reports and dashboards to regularly monitor KPIs
- Deliverable: Custom reports and dashboards

3 3. Conduct monthly performance reviews to identify areas for improvement and iterate on the inbound marketing strategy

conversations.facetValue: determine the best material for printing a money clip on a 3D printer.

allFacetValues.value: determine the best material for printing a money clip on a 3D printer.
English
provide advice on choosing a suitable material for 3D printing a money clip.

conversation.content: I am going to print a money clip on a 3D printer. It is important that the clip open to hold the money, but have enough strength to hold it in place. Basically, it needs to rigid enough to hold the bills under pressure. What material would be best for this?

There are several materials that could be suitable for printing a strong money clip on a 3D printer. Here are a few options:

1. ABS (Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene): ABS is a durable and strong thermoplastic that is commonly used in 3D printing. It has good impact resistance and can withstand high temperatures, making it a good choice for a money clip that needs to hold up under pressure.

2. PETG (Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol): PETG is another thermoplastic that is known for its strength and durability. It has good impact resistance and is more flexible than ABS, which could be an advantage in a money clip that needs to open and close.

3. Nylon: Nylon is a strong and flexible material that is often used in industrial applications. It has good abrasion resistance and can withstand high stress, making it a good choice for a money clip that needs to hold up over time.

Ultimately, the best material for your money clip will depend on your specific design and requirements. You may want to experiment with different materials to find the one that works best for your needs.
Compare PLA to PETG

PLA (Polylactic Acid) and PETG (Polyethylene Terephthalate Glycol) are two popular 3D printing materials with some significant differences. Here are some key points to compare the two:

1. Strength: PETG is generally considered stronger and more durable than PLA. While PLA can be rigid and brittle, PETG is more elastic and resistant to impact.

2. Flexibility: PETG is also more flexible than PLA. PLA is a rigid material that can crack under stress, while PETG is more forgiving and able to bend without breaking.

3. Printing: PLA is easier to print, especially for beginners. It requires lower temperatures and is generally more forgiving of common issues like warping and stringing. PETG is more challenging to print and requires higher temperatures and more precise calibration.

4. Environmental impact: PLA is derived from renewable resources like cornstarch and sugarcane, making it a popular choice for environmentally conscious users. PETG is a recyclable material, but it is derived from non-renewable sources like petroleum.

5. Appearance: PLA is known for its vibrant colors and glossy finish, making it popular for decorative items. PETG has a more translucent appearance and can be used to create clear or nearly transparent parts.

In summary, PETG is stronger, more flexible, and more challenging to print than PLA. PLA, on the other hand, is easier to work with and environmentally friendly. The choice between the two will depend on your specific application, skill level, and personal preferences.
For the money clip, I think PLA might be better because of its rigidity.

Yes, PLA could be a good choice for a money clip because it is a rigid material that can maintain its shape and hold up under pressure. Additionally, PLA is easy to print and comes in a variety of colors, which may be beneficial if you want to customize the look of your money clip. Just keep in mind that PLA can be brittle, which means it may crack or break if it is bent too far or dropped onto a hard surface. However, if you design the money clip with enough thickness and reinforcement in the stress points, it should be strong and functional.
What if I used PETG for the money clip?

You could also use PETG for a money clip. PETG is a strong and durable material with a more flexible quality than PLA, which can make it more forgiving if you need to open and close the clip frequently. However, you may need to add extra thickness to the design to compensate for the flexibility and ensure that it has enough strength to hold the bills securely. PETG can also be more difficult to print than PLA, so you may need to adjust your printing settings and experiment to find the optimal settings that work for your specific printer and design. Ultimately, the choice between the two materials will depend on your specific design needs and preferences.

conversations.facetValue: learn how to use BarTender and its APIs for printing tasks, specifically asking about Java integration possibilities.

allFacetValues.value: learn how to use BarTender and its APIs for printing tasks, specifically asking about Java integration possibilities.
English
explain how to use BarTender API with Java.

conversation.content: 可以使用html直接调用BarTender打印模版嘛
不可以直接使用HTML调用BarTender打印模板。BarTender需要通过其API（应用程序接口）进行调用。可以在BarTender软件中通过导出模板为XML格式，然后在需要的应用程序中使用BarTender的API来调用该模板进行打印。
BarTender的api

BarTender提供了一套API（应用程序接口）供开发人员使用，API分为两种：

1. COM组件：BarTender提供了一套COM（组件对象模型）接口供Windows平台上的开发人员使用，可以使用C#或VB.NET等语言调用。具体API接口详见BarTender的API手册。

2. .NET组件：BarTender还提供了一套.NET组件，可以基于.NET Framework的应用程序进行调用。具体API接口详见BarTender的.NET SDK文档。

使用BarTender API可以实现自动化打印、批量打印、集成打印等功能。
BarTender基于java调用的api

BarTender并没有官方提供基于Java的API，但是可以通过Java的COM组件来调用BarTender的COM组件，实现Java调用BarTender的功能。

Java的COM组件相关的库有JCOM、j-Interop等，使用方法与C#或VB.NET等语言调用COM组件类似。可以通过COM组件来完成BarTender的元数据操作、打印任务管理等功能。

另外，可以使用Java的Web服务调用BarTender Web服务来实现远程调用和分布式打印等功能。BarTender的Web服务提供了许多API接口，可以通过SOAP或REST方式进行调用。具体的Web服务API接口详见BarTender的Web服务文档。

conversation.content: вендинговая типография - реклама

Вендинговая типография - это современный подход к полиграфии, который позволяет быстро и без лишних затрат печатать различные виды продукции, изготовленные в короткий срок. Эффективная реклама для такого сервиса должна акцентировать внимание на преимуществах данного метода печати, а также демонстрировать разнообразие предлагаемой продукции и качество предоставляемых услуг.

1. Целевая аудитория

Определите свою целевую аудиторию и разработайте рекламные стратегии, ориентированные на различные сегменты. Вам может быть интересен широкий круг дизайнеров, маркетологов, художников и других представителей креативных профессий, а также различные компании, имеющие потребность в печатной рекламе или оформлении мероприятий.

2. Слоган

Придумайте уникальный и запоминающийся слоган, который будет привлекать внимание потенциальных клиентов. Например: "Ваша типография в кармане - быстро, качественно, доступно!" или "Печать на выдумку - вендинговая типография 24/7".

3. Рекламные материалы

Разработайте красочные и привлекательные рекламные материалы, которые демонстрируют возможности вашей вендинговой типографии. Баннеры, листовки, реклама на транспорте и наружная реклама - не упустите возможность поделиться информацией о своем сервисе.

4. Социальные сети

Активно используйте социальные сети для продвижения своего бизнеса. Создайте странички и группы в популярных соцсетях, делитесь новостями, специальными предложениями и полезной информацией. Проводите розыгрыши, конкурсы, взаимодействуйте с потенциальными клиентами.

5. Онлайн реклама

Не обойти стороной такие инструменты, как контекстная реклама и таргетированная реклама в социальных сетях. Они позволят вам эффективно привлекать потенциальных клиентов, интересующихся вашим предложением.

6. Видеоролики

Создайте короткий, но яркий видеоролик, в котором показана работа вашей вендинговой типографии. Подчеркните преимущества и практичность вашего сервиса, покажите быстроту и качество предоставляемых услуг.

7. Демонстрация результатов

Предоставьте клиентам возможность увидеть образцы продукции, выдать с вашей вендинговой типографии. Выставите такие образцы в вашем офисе, делитесь ими в социальных сетях, отправляйте по почте потенциальным клиентам.

Основывая свою рекламу на преимуществах вендинговой типографии и демонстрируя широкий спектр предоставляемых услуг, вы сможете увеличить приток клиентов и успешно развивать свой бизнесь.
Введение курсовой работы на тему: вендинговая типография

Введение

Современный мир характеризуется быстрым темпом развития технологий, что неизбежно приводит к изменениям во всех сферах жизни людей, включая печатное производство. Исключение из этого и вендинговая типография; в последние годы она стала достаточно популярным и востребованным методом полиграфических услуг. Вендинговая типография - это система автоматической печати при использовании специализированных аппаратов, что позволяет существенно сократить время процесса заказа, изготовления и выдачи продукции конечному потребителю. 

Цель данной курсовой работы заключается в исследовании концепции вендинговой типографии, анализе ее преимуществ и недостатков, а также изучении возможностей ее использования и интеграции в различные сферы жизни. В ходе работы будут рассмотрены такие аспекты, как основные технические характеристики вендинговых аппаратов, их функциональные возможности, проблемы стандартизации и качества печати, а также перспективы развития данной индустрии. Целью работы является вывод о степени эффективности и актуальности использования вендинговых типографий в современных условиях.

Для достижения данной цели необходимо решить следующие задачи:

1. Изучить теоретические аспекты работы вендинговых типографий и исследовать их на практике.
2. Определить основные преимущества и недостатки данного метода печати по сравнению с классической полиграфией.
3. Рассмотреть технологии, используемые в вендинговых типографиях, и возможности их модернизации и адаптации для разных отраслей.
4. Проанализировать рынок полиграфических услуг и определить степень конкурентоспособности вендинговых типографий.
5. Исследовать методы и инструменты маркетинга и рекламы, применимые к вендинговым типографиям, для успешного продвижения на рынке.

Актуальность данной работы заключается в возрастающей важности поиска новых и эффективных решений для печатного производства. Вендинговая типография представляет собой одновременно инновационный и экономически выгодный метод работы, благодаря которому предприятия могут оптимизировать свои процессы, сократить издержки и повысить качество готовой продукции, удовлетворяя при этом растущий спрос на высокоскоростные и надежные полиграфические услуги.

how can the blank page appear with text on this print ad?

To make the blank page appear with text on the print ad, the design could incorporate an innovative printing technique called invisible ink. This technique involves printing a clear ink onto the page that can only be seen under specific lighting conditions, such as blue or ultraviolet light. 

The text on the blank page could be printed using this invisible ink, which would be hidden from view until the reader shines a blue or ultraviolet light onto the page. Using this technique, the blank page could appear blank at first glance, but a call-to-action on the print ad could direct readers to use their smartphone flashlights to reveal the hidden text on the blank page. 

Alternatively, the blank page could use thermochromic ink, which changes color in response to heat. Readers can rub the blank page with their fingers, which creates the heat required to reveal the text on the blank page. This technique can also be multiplied with the aid of a call-to-action asking readers to take a photo of the blank page with their smartphones and then blowing it up to make the color change even more visible.

Overall, these printing techniques can create an interactive element on the print ad and add intrigue and excitement for the reader to engage and discover the content on the blank page.
how to use the phone to make the text appear on the blank page/

To make the text appear on the blank page using a smartphone, the print ad could incorporate a scannable QR code or NFC (Near-Field Communication) tag onto the blank page. Readers could scan the QR code or tap their phone on the NFC tag to trigger an interactive experience on their smartphone.

Once the code or tag is scanned, the smartphone could open a dedicated web page or mobile app, taking the reader to an interactive digital experience that uses augmented reality, as mentioned earlier.

The smartphone's camera can be used to scan the blank page, which would trigger an augmented reality experience on screen. The AR experience could highlight the winner's business vision and showcase her entrepreneurial journey using text, images or videos, as appropriate. 

Additionally, the smartphone's touch screen can also engage the reader by allowing them to swipe or tap the screen to interact with various elements within the AR experience, such as product demos or testimonials, based on the winner's business idea.

Using a smartphone to make the text appear on the blank page can provide an immersive, engaging way to deliver the content to the reader and help them discover more about the winner's business idea.

A journey to glory. 
Concept - 

Our champions are not mere beneficiaries of luck. This is not a game of chance. It is a battleground where only the finest ideas, unwavering determination, exceptional talent, and relentless pursuit of a dream prevail.

We celebrate our winners not by merely narrating their stories, but by inviting our consumers and readers to actively participate in them. We want readers to step into any point in their journeys by scanning a code and witness the immense challenges they faced, the formidable obstacles they conquered, the failures they encountered, and the remarkable achievements they attained despite all odds.

Our winners are not just fortunate bystanders, but valiant warriors who fought tooth and nail to realise their aspirations. They are an embodiment of resilience, tenacity, and unwavering commitment. Their stories are not just about luck, but about the power of the human spirit and the unwavering resolve to never give up.

Every box will be named with contextual events from their journey to glory.

- Business plan - Learning and unlearning. 

- Business Loan - Debt or dead? 

- Dream - The fairytale of entrepreneurship.

Through this immersive experience, our intent is to inspire and motivate individuals to pursue their dreams with the same level of perseverance and resilience as our esteemed winners.

Print: 
H/L: 
Entrepreneurship isn’t a child’s game. 
But Smitha made it so. 

S/L: 
Scan the code and roll the dice on Smitha’s entrepreneurial journey. 

Body copy: 
Smitha's victory in Britannia My Startup Contest season 4 is a triumph of creativity and determination. Her win inspires young entrepreneurs and chefs to pursue their passion in healthy snacks. Scan the code below to see how she is getting ready to take the snack world by storm.

Experience Smitha's entrepreneurial journey like never before. Scan the QR code on our Monopoly-inspired board game print ad and roll the dice to witness her challenges, obstacles, failures, and triumphs, all while being inspired to pursue your own dreams.
tell me more.

Our Monopoly-inspired board game print ad allows readers to engage with the journey of our winner, Smitha, in a unique and immersive way. By scanning the QR code, readers can roll the dice and land on different squares, each square representing a key moment in Smitha's journey. 

Each square is named after a contextual event from Smitha's journey, such as fundraising, business plan, business loan, dream, and the first pitch. By landing on each square, readers can learn about the obstacles Smitha faced and overcame, the challenges she encountered, the failures she experienced, and ultimately, the triumphs she achieved.

The print ad is visually engaging, with a Monopoly board game design that portrays Smitha as the central hero. By showcasing Smitha's resilience and determination, our intent is to inspire young entrepreneurs and chefs to pursue their passion with the same level of perseverance.

The headline, "Entrepreneurship isn't a child's game. But Smitha made it so", does a great job of summarizing the message of the ad. The sub-headline, "Scan the QR code and roll the dice on Smitha's entrepreneurial journey" is a clear call-to-action that encourages readers to engage further with the ad.

The body copy highlights Smitha's win in the Britannia My Startup Contest season 4 and her passion for healthy snacks. This creates an emotional connection with the reader, making them more invested in her journey.

Overall, our Monopoly-inspired board game print ad is a fun, interactive, and inspiring way to showcase the journey of an entrepreneur, while also encouraging others to pursue their own dreams.

shorten this :What it takes to be a winner 

Concept - 
Many believe that there is a secret formula to winning, a roadmap to success, or a shortcut to greatness. However, in reality, such shortcuts seldom exist.

Each journey towards success is unique and marked by numerous challenges, failures, and sacrifices.

It is often assumed that success follows a linear path, but the truth is that the obstacles and struggles one encounters on that path are only truly understood by those who have achieved success.

For the first time ever, we offer an exclusive glimpse into the journeys of our winners and give readers an opportunity to witness their stories unfold.

Success is not a linear path, and shortcuts to greatness are rare. Witness the journeys of our winners in an exclusive glimpse, showcasing their challenges, failures, and sacrifices, all for the pursuit of success.
tell me more.

Our concept highlights the fact that there are no shortcuts to success or guaranteed formulas for winning. Each person's journey towards success is unique and marked by numerous challenges, failures, and sacrifices. 

The concept also emphasizes that success is not linear, and the path towards it is often clouded with obstacles and struggles that can only be understood by those who have experienced it. 

By offering an exclusive glimpse into the journeys of our winners, we give readers an opportunity to witness their stories unfold, which can ultimately inspire them to pursue their own dreams with the same level of dedication, perseverance, and resilience as our esteemed winners. 

Overall, the concept encourages readers to acknowledge the challenges in their own journey towards success, while also providing them with a source of inspiration for overcoming them.

How about creating an augmented reality (AR) experience where the announcement print is linked to a free mobile app? The app can be available on both iOS and Android platforms and uses the camera on the user's phone or tablet to scan the print ad.

Once the ad is scanned, the user can see a 3D animation of the winners being announced, with confetti and balloons falling from the top of the screen, making it a visually appealing experience. The app can also include details about the winning startups, their products or services, and their value proposition.

To further engage the audience, the app can also have a section for user-generated content, where users can upload their own videos or pictures celebrating the winners or sharing their thoughts on the contest. This interactive feature can create a sense of community among the users and increase brand engagement.

The AR experience can be promoted through social media channels, email marketing, and on the company's website, creating a buzz around the contest and increasing the reach of the brand.
how can the tech be used on a front page of the newspaper as a print ad gimmick? how can the text appear on it?

To use augmented reality (AR) on a front page of the newspaper as a print ad gimmick, you can follow the below steps:

1. Creating an AR experience: Create an interactive AR experience that will appear when readers scan the front-page ad with their mobile device. This can be achieved through the use of AR markers or image recognition technology.

2. Promoting the app: Promote the free mobile app that readers will need to download to access the AR experience. Include a call to action for readers to download the app and scan the ad to join the fun.

3. Providing instructions: Include clear instructions on how to scan the ad using the app. This can be in the form of simple graphics or text.

4. Enhancing the text: Use the AR experience to enhance the text on the ad. For example, you can make the text come alive with a 3D animation, or use the AR to highlight specific words, phrases or images.

5. Making it visually appealing: Utilize engaging graphics, animations, or 3D components that will make the text and the overall ad more visually appealing.

6. Interacting with readers: Encourage readers to interact with the ad, by sharing the AR experience on social media, taking a picture with the app of the ad, or even conducting an interactive poll or survey.

Overall, using AR technology to enhance the front page of a newspaper as a print ad gimmick is a great way to engage readers and make the text more interactive and visually appealing.

conversation.content: how to use audio in a print ad?

As an AI language model, I cannot listen or create audio. However, as per my understanding, to use audio in a print ad, you could:

1. Include a QR code in the print ad that links to an audio message or ad. This way, users can scan the code using their mobile and listen to the audio.

2. Place a small embedded speaker on the print ad that plays a short audio clip when the ad is opened or flipped.

3. Use a tagline or slogan that mentions an audio message associated with the product or service. For example, "Listen to our new radio ad on 102.5 FM."

4. Offer an audio CD as a freebie or giveaway with the print ad that contains information about the product or service.

5. Create an interactive print ad that allows users to press a button or touch a specific part of the ad to trigger an audio message.
how can this be achieved :Place a small embedded speaker on the print ad that plays a short audio clip when the ad is opened or flipped.

To place a small embedded speaker on a print ad, you will need to follow these steps:

1. Choose a suitable audio clip that enhances the message of your print ad.

2. Find a small, thin speaker that can fit into your print ad. You may need to consult an audio equipment supplier or a printed electronics expert.

3. Program the audio clip into the speaker. This may require some technical expertise, or you may need to hire a professional audio production team.

4. Design your print ad to include a small slit or opening where the speaker can be placed. The speaker should be positioned in a way that it is not visible to the viewer and does not cause any damage to the print ad.

5. Test the print ad and the embedded speaker to ensure that the audio clip plays correctly and at the appropriate volume.

It's important to note that placing an embedded speaker in a print ad can be a complex and expensive process, and may not be suitable for all types of print ads. You should consider the cost and potential return on investment before deciding whether to use this method.
how to attach a audio clip to a print ad?

There are different ways to attach an audio clip to a print ad, including:

1. QR code: You can include a QR code in the print ad that links to an audio clip online. Users can scan the QR code using their mobile device, and the audio clip plays on their device.

2. Augmented Reality (AR): You can use AR technology to attach an audio clip to your print ad. Users can use an AR app to scan the ad, and the app will display a video or a 3D animation along with the audio clip.

3. Embedded chip: You can embed an electronic chip in your print ad that plays an audio clip when activated. This method can be expensive and technically challenging, but it can create an immersive and interactive experience for the user.

4. Text: You can include a call-to-action in your print ad that encourages users to listen to an audio clip. For example, you can write "Text 'AUDIO' to 12345 to listen to our message."

5. Audio CD: You can include an audio CD as a freebie or a giveaway with your print ad. The CD contains the audio clip, and users can listen to it on their CD player or a computer.

Depending on your budget, target audience, and the type of print ad you're creating, you can choose the most appropriate method to attach an audio clip to your print ad.

how to use scan to change the headlines on the newspaper?

To use scanning technology to change the headlines on a newspaper, you would need to follow a few steps:

1. Create a special code or symbol that can be recognized by scanning technology, such as a QR code.

2. Embed this code or symbol in certain sections of the newspaper where you want the text to change. The code will need to be placed in a conspicuous place that is easily scannable.

3. Provide clear instructions to the reader on how to scan the code using a mobile device. This could be done by including a short blurb near the code with instructions like, "Scan this code to see the latest headlines!"

4. Create a database with several different headline options that correspond to each code. As the user scans the relevant code, this database will be accessed, and new headlines and stories will be displayed.

5. Use a content management system to ensure that the headlines being displayed through the code are up-to-date and relevant.

This technology would allow newspapers to offer readers more dynamic content that changes throughout the day or over a certain period. This interactive print concept is an innovative way to engage readers and provide them with the latest news and information.

conversation.content: how to let the Britannia Marie start up contest winners become a talking point. how can a print ad leverage that? give me ideas.

1. Highlight the Winning Entries: A print ad could showcase the winning entries of the Britannia Marie Start-Up Contest, along with the winners and their businesses. This could generate interest and encourage people to learn more about the winners and their projects.

2. Use Quotes From the Winners: The print ad could feature quotes from the winners talking about their experiences or the impact the contest has had on their businesses. This could make the winners relatable and could encourage others to participate in future contests.

3. Add a Call to Action: The ad could invite the audience to connect with the winners on social media or visit their website. This could increase awareness for the winners and their businesses, and encourage more interactions between them and the audience.

4. Focus on the Impact: The ad could showcase how the contest helped the winners reach their goals and achieve their dreams. This could attract more people to participate in future contests and help promote the brand's commitment to supporting local entrepreneurs.

5. Feature Real Photographs: The print ad could feature high-quality, professional photographs of the winners and their businesses. This could evoke emotions and help the audience visualize the winners' stories, making them more memorable.

6. Use Catchy Headlines: The ad could feature bold and catchy headlines that grab the reader's attention and promote the winners' stories. This could make the print ad stand out from the rest and increase its chances of being shared on social media. 

Overall, the print ad should focus on highlighting the winning entries, showcasing real stories of entrepreneurship, and encouraging more people to participate in future contests.

One interesting interactive print ad idea is to use a hidden message or image that can only be revealed through a special action. Here's how it could work:

1. Create a print ad that features an intriguing image or message. The image or message should be something that will pique the curiosity of the reader and make them want to engage with the ad.

2. Include instructions in the ad that tell the reader they need to do something special to reveal the hidden message or image. For example, you could tell the reader to hold the ad up to a light, scan a QR code, or scratch off a secret area of the ad.

3. When the reader follows the instructions, they will reveal the hidden message or image. The message or image could be a special coupon code, a link to a website with more information about your product, or a fun interactive game.

4. Finally, encourage the reader to share their experience with others on social media using a specific hashtag or tagline. This will help spread the word about your interactive print ad and create buzz around your brand.

Overall, this interactive print ad idea is effective because it encourages the reader to engage with the ad in a fun and unique way. It also creates a sense of mystery and excitement around your brand that can help generate interest and engagement.

This type of marketing has become increasingly popular in recent years, as consumers are looking for brands that share their values and support causes that matter to them. The concept for this idea involves creating an interactive print ad campaign that utilizes QR codes to allow viewers to hear the words of the startup contest winners. The front page of the print ad will feature a photo of each winner, with a QR code next to each image. When the viewer scans the code using their smartphone, the image will be activated, and a message from the winner will be played through the phone speaker.

To hear the message, the viewer must keep the phone screen near the winner’s mouth, creating a sense of intimacy and connection between the viewer and the entrepreneur. The message itself will be an inspiring and uplifting speech from the winner to her younger self, reflecting on her journey as an entrepreneur and how proud she is of what she has accomplished.

The copy of the ad will emphasize the importance of women’s empowerment and representation in the startup world. It will highlight the challenges faced by women entrepreneurs and the need for support and encouragement from the community. It will also emphasize how the achievements of each winner represent a step forward for all women in the field of entrepreneurship.
